alert.note: Alert for Greenwood; Laurens (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 2:59PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Laurens and north central Greenwood Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 259 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Laurens, or 4 miles northwest of Waterloo, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Laurens, Clinton, Cross Hill, Waterloo, Joanna, Lake Greenwood and Mountville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
